product.name: Age group
product.description: Defines the target age range for a product, such as adults or kids

product.name: Product certifications & standards
product.description: Indicates the certifications or standards a product meets, such as organic or cruelty free

product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Ingredient category
product.description: Classifies the type of ingredients in vitamins and supplements, e.g. fiber, herbs

product.name: Detailed ingredients
product.description: Lists specific components used in health and beauty, e.g. Vitamin C, probiotics

product.name: Dietary preferences
product.description: Helps identify products suitable for specific diets, e.g. vegan, nut free

product.name: Flavor
product.description: Specifies the taste or flavor of a product, e.g. vanilla, mint

product.name: Why you'll love it:
product.description: Explain why this product will be loved by the client
